Title: Relates to the imposition of securing orders for certain crimes committed by individuals without permanent residency status
Summary: Relates to the imposition of securing orders for offenses committed on a peace officer, police officer, firefighter, emergency medical services professional or uniformed worker by individuals without permanent residency status; provides such individuals shall be remanded to the custody of the sheriff for the entirety of the judicial proceedings related thereto.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to the imposition of securing orders for certain crimes committed by individuals without permanent residency status
